name: Arcadia
description:
Arcadia is a Russian outsourcing software development company operating on international market. Our team consists of 500 talented professionals and it has been delivering quality services to our clients for over 25 years. We cover full cycle of software development: from business analysis and design to implementation, testing and support.
A few facts about our company:
Arcadia is a private company with 26 years on the outsourcing software development market.
We have 500 employees located in St. Petersburg, Russia; Taganrog, Russia and Minsk, Belarus.
All our employees speak English.
More than 98% of our customers are companies from USA, UK and Nordic countries; we’ve been working on foreign market of bespoke software.
Our focuses are: high-loaded web applications, mobile apps for business and enterprise systems.
.NET, Java, PHP, Python, NodeJS, iOS, Android, HTML5, SQL Server and Oracle are our core competences.
We have done a lot of modernization and re-engineering projects.
